summary: Four friends on their way to Coachella stop off in Los Angeles to tour true-crime occult sites, only to encounter a mysterious young runaway who puts them on a terrifying path to ultimate horror.
cast: Sarah Hyland|Steven Krueger|Justin Chon|Clara Mamet|Sophie Dalah|Anthony Carrigan|Marc Barnes|Stevin Knight|Nancy Barcellona|William "Will" Daubert|Jeffrey G. Hunt|Jim Jepson|Anton LaVey|Devanny Pinn
director: Director: Jeffrey G. Hunt (as Jeffrey Hunt)
title: Satanic
